aboutPage.title: About Sparkle
aboutPage.subtitle: Making trusted cleaning services simple, reliable, and accessible for everyone.
aboutPage.missionText1: Sparkle was founded with a simple idea: finding trusted cleaners should be as easy as ordering a ride or booking a table. We connect customers with reliable cleaners who care about quality and detail.
aboutPage.missionText2: Whether it's a one-time deep clean or ongoing help, Sparkle makes sure the process is quick, transparent, and worry-free.
aboutPage.step1: Post your cleaning request in minutes
aboutPage.step3: Book and pay securely through our app
aboutPage.step4: Relax while we handle the rest
aboutPage.trustSafetyDesc: Every cleaner is verified and reviewed to keep your home safe.
aboutPage.qualityServiceDesc: We hold high standards to make sure every booking leaves your home sparkling.
aboutPage.communityDesc: We empower cleaners with fair opportunities and customers with reliable service.
aboutPage.joinToday: Join Sparkle today and experience stress-free cleaning.
